name: Stress Random
description:
Stress Random - 2D looter shooter with random generation of levels, monsters and loot. You play as a hikka living under the surface of Mars.

You are a hikka in this world, with a strange name, who does not have any duties like "save the world, the universe, build communism, etc."

Main features:

  • Labyrinths, battle places are generated randomly.
  • Monsters collect body parts in the same way.
  • Endless pumping of equipment, increasing the progress and level of cards.
  • Deep customization system for weapons and armor.
  • Wealth on this planet is determined by the amount of despair (this is something like an ore that you can pour into your blood).
  • There is a casino here where you can sustainably maintain your poverty

Basically, the game relies on gameplay, so there is very little thoughtful plot or philosophical context here.
